abilities.desc: Morphling dissolves into liquid and surges forward, damaging enemy units in his path.  Morphling is invulnerable during Waveform.
abilities.name: Waveform

abilities.desc: Launches a surge of water toward an enemy unit, dealing base damage plus additional damage based on Morphling's agility times a multiplier.  If Morphling's agility is 50% higher than strength, the maximum agility multiplier is used.  Also puts Adaptive Strike (Strength) on a 3 second cooldown.
abilities.name: Adaptive Strike (Agility)

abilities.desc: Launches a surge of water toward an enemy unit, stunning and knocking back the target based on Morphling's strength. If his strength is 50% higher than his agility, the maximum stun/knockback is dealt.  Also puts Adaptive Strike (Agility) on a 3 second cooldown.
abilities.name: Adaptive Strike (Strength)

abilities.desc: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Strength and pouring them into Agility. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Attribute Shift increase the rate of stat change.  Passively grants bonus Agility.
abilities.name: Attribute Shift (Agility Gain)
abilities.notes: Leveling up Agility Gain will also level up Strength Gain.

abilities.desc: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Agility and pouring them into Strength. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Attribute Shift increase the rate of stat change.  Passively grants bonus Strength.
abilities.name: Attribute Shift (Strength Gain)
abilities.notes: Leveling up Strength Gain will also level up Agility Gain.

abilities.desc: Morphling changes his form to match the targeted enemy, gaining their basic abilities. Can be toggled for the duration of the ability.
abilities.name: Morph
abilities.notes: Morph won't copy Shard/Scepter abilities unless Morphling owns the respective item.

abilities.desc: Toggles Morphling's form between his own and the replicated enemy.
abilities.name: Morph Replicate
